Module ZiqiYang
Package org.ziqi.gameEngine.base

Class PopUpScreen

java.lang.Object
org.ziqi.gameEngine.base.GameScreen
org.ziqi.gameEngine.base.PopUpScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlertPopUp, QuitGamePopUp, ScoreBoardPopUp
public abstract class PopUpScreen
extends GameScreen
PopUpScreen class is the second level hierarchy abstract class of the GameScreen representing a new pop up screen instead of a screen shown by stage of ScreenPlayer.
The display of this object will be implemented as an adapter design pattern by ViewAdapter.
Author:
Ziqi Yang
See Also:
ViewAdapter

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.lang.String m_Message
    String value specifying the message to be shown in pop up screen.
